EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations, {!Contact.FirstName}'s place on NCS is confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Congratulations!
As you know, NCS have been working with {!Contact.College_Sixth_Form__c} and {!Contact.FirstName}’s place on NCS is now booked. We’ll send you a programme information pack approximately one month before this. We’ll also invite you to an information evening a few weeks before your NCS programme starts.
The dates {!Contact.FirstName} will be on NCS are:
Part 1 - Get Active Staying away from home: {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_Return_Day__c}
Part 2 - Get Involved Daily activities, staying at home at night: {!Wave_Selection__c.TC_KO_Day__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.TC_End_Day__c}
Part 3 - Make Your Mark Daily activities, staying at home at night: {!Wave_Selection__c.RCD_Start_Date__c}, {!Wave_Selection__c.RCD_End_Date__c}, {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA1_Sat__c} and {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA_2_Sat__c}
Find out more about what will happen on {!Contact.FirstName}’s programme by clicking here: {!Wave_Selection__c.Acc_comm_prog_variation_URL__c}
Search for more information about NCS here: http://questions.ncsthechallenge.org/
We are really looking forward to seeing {!Contact.FirstName} on NCS.
Kind regards,
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
